title: Pre-commit hook runs tests
description: Add pre-commit hook that runs test-ralph.zsh before allowing commit. If any test fails, commit is blocked. This ensures tests stay in sync with code - any breaking change will fail a test.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create pre-commit hook that runs test-ralph.zsh
If any test fails, commit is blocked with error message
Show which test(s) failed in output
Hook can be bypassed with --no-verify for emergencies
Fast execution (< 5 seconds for all tests)
Add to install-hooks.sh for easy setup
